attributes.action: Stop New Builds Being Built In Clitheroe & Ribble Valley For The Next 10 Years
attributes.additional_details:
Are you fed up of.. seeing housing developers destroy green field after green field?
Or seeing public footpaths lost for good?
Of various animals and wildlife losing their habitat?
How about the relentless sets of temporary roadworks?
The 4 week wait to see a GP as the surgery is full to bursting? (And no new health centres being built)
Permanent traffic jams?
Construction traffic churning up the roads?
Or developers winning every single appeal, if their application is rejected?
attributes.background:
Stop housing developers destroying everything around us. Preserve our green fields for the next 10 years.
Stop Anymore New Builds Being Built In Clitheroe & Ribble Valley Now, as the town and villages are suffocating with the sheer amount of new houses being built & insufficient infrastructure.

rejection.details:
Planning decisions for your area are the responsibility of Ribble Valley Borough Council. If you wished to share your concerns with the Council, you can find out how to do this here: https://www.ribblevalley.gov.uk/info/200393/have_your_say.

You could also contact your MP and ask them to take action on your behalf. You can find their contact details by entering your post code here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP.
